lang.close_channel_end: The gaming session was closed successfully.
lang.close_channel_start: Please wait. SPL The gaming session is closed.
lang.open_channel_start: Please wait. SPL Sending BETs into the game
lang.reset_desc: All data about the current session will be deleted. Are you sure?
lang.hint_deal: To activate 'Deal' please choose a bet
lang.hint_split: To play 'Split' wait for dealt a pair
lang.error_bank: No money in the bank. Please contact to administrator.
lang.error_transaction: The transaction is not sent. Please contact technical support.
lang.error_balance: You do not have enough money.
lang.error_balance_bet: You do not have enough BET.
lang.error_bankroller: No online bankroller. Come back later.
